typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		bay_id as string,
		st_marker_id as string,
		status as string,
		location as (latitude as string, longitude as string, human_address as string),
		lat as string,
		lon as string,
		{:@computed_region_evbi_jbp8} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ParkingData
ParkingData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParkingDataLake
